statements: SELECT * FROM fashion_designs
SELECT designer_name, design_sketch FROM fashion_designs WHERE id = 1
SELECT id, designer_name, fabric_sample FROM fashion_designs ORDER BY designer_name DESC
SELECT * FROM fashion_designs WHERE designer_name LIKE 'John%'
SELECT id, designer_name, production_notes FROM fashion_designs WHERE fabric_sample IS NOT NULL
SELECT designer_name, design_sketch FROM fashion_designs WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM fashion_designs WHERE designer_name LIKE 'J%';
SELECT designer_name, design_sketch, production_notes FROM fashion_designs WHERE production_notes IS NOT NULL ORDER BY designer_name DESC;
SELECT id, designer_name, SUBSTRING(design_sketch, 1, 50) AS short_design_sketch FROM fashion_designs WHERE LENGTH(design_sketch) > 100;
SELECT designer_name, COUNT(*) AS design_count FROM fashion_designs GROUP BY designer_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 1 ORDER BY design_count DESC;
SELECT designer_name FROM designers;
SELECT designer_name, design_sketches FROM designers;
SELECT design_name, design_description, design_image_url FROM designs;
SELECT * FROM designers WHERE designer_id = 1;
SELECT designer_name, design_name FROM designers JOIN designs ON designers.designer_id = designs.designer_id;
SELECT * FROM designers WHERE designer_id = 1;
SELECT designer_name, design_sketches FROM designers WHERE designer_id = 3;
SELECT design_name, design_description, design_image_url FROM designs WHERE designer_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM designs WHERE design_id BETWEEN 10 AND 20;
SELECT designer_name, COUNT(design_name) AS total_designs FROM designers JOIN designs ON designers.designer_id = designs.designer_id GROUP BY designer_name HAVING total_designs > 5;
SELECT * FROM fashion_designers;
SELECT designer_name, email FROM fashion_designers ORDER BY designer_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM design_sketches WHERE designer_id = 1;
SELECT sketch_description FROM design_sketches WHERE sketch_id = 3;
SELECT designer_name, fabric_name FROM fashion_designers JOIN fabric_samples ON fashion_designers.designer_id = fabric_samples.designer_id;
SELECT * FROM fashion_designers WHERE designer_id = 1;
SELECT designer_name, email FROM fashion_designers ORDER BY designer_name DESC;
SELECT designer_name, COUNT(*) AS num_sketches FROM fashion_designers JOIN design_sketches ON fashion_designers.designer_id = design_sketches.designer_id GROUP BY designer_name;

SELECT designer_name, COUNT(*) AS num_samples FROM fashion_designers LEFT JOIN fabric_samples ON fashion_designers.designer_id = fabric_samples.designer_id GROUP BY designer_name HAVING COUNT(*) >= 2;
SELECT * FROM fabric_samples JOIN fashion_designers ON fabric_samples.designer_id = fashion_designers.designer_id WHERE fabric_name ILIKE 'silk';
SELECT * FROM fashion_designers;
SELECT designer_name, design_sketches FROM fashion_designers WHERE designer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT sample_name, material FROM fabric_samples ORDER BY sample_name DESC;
SELECT designer_name, sketch_title, created_at FROM fashion_designers JOIN design_sketches ON fashion_designers.designer_id = design_sketches.designer_id;
SELECT * FROM production_notes WHERE created_at > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM fashion_designers;
SELECT designer_name, design_sketches FROM fashion_designers WHERE designer_id='f0cb4b7e-f846-448a-90fc-c72311f84b41';
SELECT designer_name, production_notes FROM fashion_designers ORDER BY designer_name DESC;
SELECT designer_name, sample_name, material FROM fashion_designers JOIN fabric_samples ON fashion_designers.designer_id = fabric_samples.designer_id;

SELECT designer_name, sketch_title, note_title FROM fashion_designers JOIN design_sketches ON fashion_designers.designer_id = design_sketches.designer_id JOIN production_notes ON fashion_designers.designer_id = production_notes.designer_id WHERE designer_name LIKE 'J%';
SELECT designer_id, designer_name FROM designers;
SELECT design_sketches.sketch_id, designer_name, sketch_data FROM design_sketches INNER JOIN designers ON design_sketches.designer_id = designers.designer_id;
SELECT sample_id, designer_name, sample_data FROM fabric_samples INNER JOIN designers ON fabric_samples.designer_id = designers.designer_id;
SELECT note_text, designer_name FROM production_notes INNER JOIN designers ON production_notes.designer_id = designers.designer_id;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users;
SELECT * FROM designers;
SELECT designer_id, designer_name FROM designers ORDER BY designer_name DESC;
SELECT designer_name, design_sketches FROM designers WHERE designer_id = 'c36233ed-7c26-4f72-aeff-07ee28986020';
SELECT designer_name, fabric_samples FROM designers JOIN fabric_samples ON designers.designer_id = fabric_samples.designer_id;
SELECT * FROM production_notes WHERE note_text LIKE '%important%' ORDER BY note_id;
